archimate:Node.name: [L1 Base] Spectrograph Observatory Operations Services Node -- Spectrograph Scale (Logical Node)
archimate:Node.documentation:
The spectrograph observatory Operations Servince node has sufficent disk to buffer data acquired by the spectrograph. The Buffer ingests data at the maximum data rate supported bu the spectrograph archiver, ,while sustaind accessedneeded by observing operations and ingest into the data backboe propoer.
Data Achiving cannot proceed if the Observing Operations node is down, not can the operations suported by buffer continue if the Observing Operations node is down.
The buffer is capacious enough to allow for spectrograph archiving to continue over the longest perod of planned outage of the data Backbone Raw data ingest point.The Buffer is also large enough to hold recently acquired data for use by observing operations.
